titleStmt.title: Observations on the proposals of the City, to insure houses in case of fire
titleStmt.author: Fire Office (London, England)

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for the gentlemen of the Insurance Office on the back-side of the Royal-Exchange where these papers are to be had gratis,

notesStmt.note: Part of a controversy between the City of London and the Insurance Office for Houses; related documents are dated 1681.
Reproduction of the original in the Goldsmith's Company Library, University of London, London, England.
